column99:
At SBS Friction A/S, we are currently looking for a skilled Category Manager to manage the company’s trade goods, such as brake discs, clutches, and related accessories. This is your opportunity to become part of an exciting, internationally-oriented company in development, with a start date as soon as possible. 
 About the Position 
 As a Category Manager in the Product Management department at SBS Friction A/S, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the product catalog for brake discs, clutches, and other accessories associated with brake pads for the aftermarket. You will play a key role in the back-office team, where a crucial task is identifying product adaptation for vehicles and delivering product data to customers and end-users worldwide. You will have specific responsibility for the continued development of the clutch program and ECE R90 compliance for the brake disc program. At SBS, we work digitally with product data in Perfion (PIM). 
 Personal Characteristics 
 
 Strong overview and excellent project development skills 
 Committed to completing tasks and structured in task management 
 Technically inclined and able to organize technical information for others' understanding 
 Socially oriented, both in collaboration and generally, yet capable of working independently 
 Approachable and friendly by nature, contributing to a pleasant work environment 
 Experience with and interest in two- and four-wheeled vehicles is an advantage 
 
 Qualifications 
 
 Advanced user of Excel and VBA programming 
 Solid technical understanding of vehicles/motorcycles 
 Experience in finding vehicle information 
 Practical experience with project development and managing projects from A to Z 
 Proficient in written and spoken Danish and English (company language is English) 
 
 We Offer 
 
 A position in an exciting international company undergoing rapid development 
 Opportunity to leave your mark on your tasks 
 A unique chance to experience production up close, as much of it is located in Svendborg 
 A welcoming and informal work environment 
 Workplace in an international group company with major and interesting brands like Brembo, JJuan, and Akrapovich 
 Career opportunities for those wishing to develop their role internally in the long term 
 Professional, approachable, and helpful colleagues 
 Massage program 
 Active employee association 
 Delicious and varied lunch arrangement 
 Fitness facilities 
 
 About SBS Friction A/S 
 SBS Friction is the preferred OE and aftermarket supplier of brake pads and friction solutions for motorcycles, scooters, ATVs/UTVs, specialty cars, and industrial applications, including wind turbines. Our product portfolio also includes brake discs, clutch kits, brake shoes, and more. SBS Friction was the first in the industry to achieve full approval under the ECE R90 regulation, ensuring motorcyclists the most reliable quality in terms of design, manufacturing, and performance. Additionally, SBS brake pads feature NUCAP NRS technology, which ensures a mechanical and indestructible bond of the friction material. SBS Friction is part of the Brembo Group and your reliable supplier of brake components when you seek the best braking performance. Go Ahead – we have the power to stop you! Learn more at https://www.sbsbrakes.com/. 
 Start Date 
 We need our new colleague as soon as possible and will therefore conduct interviews on an ongoing basis. The position will be filled as soon as the right candidate is found. If this sounds interesting, hurry and send a motivated application and CV via the link below. 
 If you have questions about the position or would like a brief evaluation of your profile concerning the role, feel free to contact HR Partner Per Schorling at +45 2332 5825. 
 If you have any questions, you are welcome to reach out.
